operations.notes: Show information about whether workflow is enabled or disabled. Retrieve the IDs of registered asset bundles. Requests GET https://localhost:9443/ibm/iis/igc-rest/v1/workflow/status HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/json Host: localhost:9443 Accept-Encoding: identity Response HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: Content-Length: 47 { "isWorkflowEnabled": false }

operations.summary: Request approval for assets that are in the Draft state
operations.notes:
Request approval for assets that are in Pending Approval state by passing in a JSON object or primitive value.

See the "Show Examples" section to see the syntax of the JSON object.

Request approval for a list of assets in draft mode, supplying an optional comment Requests POST https://localhost:9443/ibm/iis/igc-rest/v1/workflow/request HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/json Host: localhost:9443 Accept-Encoding: identity { "ids" : [ "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.66okk5ben.mhtrupk.cudseb.sbtk3vi251r4bqld0g1l4", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.66okk5beo.5u9dlsq.ck7jvd.ua38k0l01ago5mlppbdlk", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.66okk5beo.kr6dju0.o6k15e.ge1adbut30dpsib0l0ddc" ], "comment" : "I'd like to submit these changes to production." } Response HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: Content-Length: 0

responseMessages.message: Workflow settings cannot be changed to the requested state

operations.notes:
Discard assets that are in Draft state by passing in a JSON object or primitive value.

See the "Show Examples" section to see the syntax of the JSON object.

Discard a list of assets in the draft glossary, supplying an optional comment. Requests POST https://localhost:9443/ibm/iis/igc-rest/v1/workflow/discard HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/json Host: localhost:9443 Accept-Encoding: identity { "ids" : [ "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.66okk5bec.h7bv3sj.87kacm.hbbvk07jucfkjnt9usca9", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.66okk5bed.23ivn5p.j67efh.6ot2lg3fkob1hjhjpkfip", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.66okk5bed.k2ac8a1.uqptbu.c13pc2asmset79k1ofqa5" ], "comment" : "The changes are not ready yet." } Response HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: Content-Length: 0

parameters.description: List the RID number of each asset in a JSON object. Separate each RID with a comma (,). The RID of an asset is the value of  '_id ' in the GET /search command

operations.summary: Get the RID of the published asset that corresponds to the specified asset draft
operations.notes: Retrieves the RID of the published asset that corresponds to the specified asset draft. If the specified asset was not published yet, or it is not controlled by workflow, no result is returned.

parameters.name: assetDraftRid
parameters.description: The RID of the draft asset

responseMessages.message: The specified RID does not correspond to an existing asset draft

operations.summary: Approve assets that are in the Pending Approval state.
operations.notes:
Approve assets that are in the Pending Approval state by passing in a JSON object or primitive value.

See the "Show Examples" section to see the syntax of the JSON object.

Approve a list of assets in the Pending Approval state in the development glossary. Optional comment added. Requests POST https://localhost:9443/ibm/iis/igc-rest/v1/workflow/approve HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/json Host: localhost:9443 Accept-Encoding: identity { "ids" : [ "6662c0f2.ee6a64fe.66d4kcs0g.biq018m.cf4shj.3fvi5a8cs30af8lqbm0qo", "6662c0f2.ee6a64fe.66d4kcs0i.dghuhu7.7kb0ld.bg63p2rl064vi2j9mnoc4", "6662c0f2.ee6a64fe.66d4kcs0j.ae7qqig.h5emjh.it3uhjedo8f6c95fqsjok" ], "comment" : "The changes to these assets meet my expectations" } Response HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: Content-Length: 0

parameters.description: List the RID number of each asset in a JSON object. Separate each RID with a comma (,). The RID of an asset is the value of  '_id ' in the GET /search command.

responseMessages.message: Workflow settings cannot be changed to the requested state

operations.summary: Return assets that are in the Pending Approval or Approval state to Draft state
operations.notes:
Return assets that are in Pending Approval or Approval state to Draft state by passing in a JSON object or primitive value.

See the "Show Examples" section to see the syntax of the JSON object.

Return a list of assets to draft mode, supplying an optional comment Request POST https://localhost:9443/ibm/iis/igc-rest/v1/workflow/return HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/json Host: localhost:9443 Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdch { "ids" : [ "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.4b3c.a690c9a6-b485-4556.88f6.1623c116f682", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.2fc5615f.c9e06bc9-f800-407d.893a.9520f4953aeb", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.4119a15d.1dc5331d-ad17-47c3.befc.bec788befc4b" ], "comment" : "The changes are not yet ready" } Response HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: application/json Content-Length: 0

parameters.description: List the RID number of each asset in a JSON object. Separate each RID with a comma (,). The RID of an asset is the value of  '_id ' in the GET /search command

operations.summary: Get the current user Workflow Roles

operations.notes: Adds a comment to list of assets Request POST https://localhost:9443/ibm/iis/igc-rest/v1/workflow/addComment HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/json Host: localhost:9443 Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdch { "ids" : [ "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.4b3c.a690c9a6-b485-4556.88f6.1623c116f682", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.2fc5615f.c9e06bc9-f800-407d.893a.9520f4953aeb", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.4119a15d.1dc5331d-ad17-47c3.befc.bec788befc4b" ], "comment" : "This is a comment" } Response HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: application/json Content-Length: 0

parameters.description: List the RID number of each asset in a JSON object. Separate each RID with a comma (,). The RID of an asset is the value of  '_id ' in the GET /search command

responseMessages.message: Workflow is not enabled or asset does not exists.

operations.summary: Publish assets that are in the Approved state
operations.notes:
Publish assets that are in Approved state by passing in a JSON object or primitive value.

See the "Show Examples" section to see the syntax of the JSON object.

Publish a list of assets to the production glossary, supplying an optional comment Request POST https://localhost:9443/ibm/iis/igc-rest/v1/workflow/publish HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/json Host: localhost:9443 Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdch { "ids" : [ "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.4b3c.a690c9a6-b485-4556.88f6.1623c116f682", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.2fc5615f.c9e06bc9-f800-407d.893a.9520f4953aeb", "6662c0f2.e1b1ec6c.4119a15d.1dc5331d-ad17-47c3.befc.bec788befc4b" ], "comment" : "Publishing these assets to production" } Response HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: application/json Content-Length: 0

parameters.description: List the RID number of each asset in a JSON object. Separate each RID with a comma (,). The RID of an asset is the value of  '_id ' in the GET /search command

operations.summary: Get the RID of the asset draft that corresponds to the specified published asset
operations.notes: Retrieves the RID of the asset draft that corresponds to the specified published asset. If the specified asset is not controlled by workflow, no result is returned.

parameters.name: publishedAssetRid
parameters.description: The RID of the published asset

responseMessages.message: The specified RID does not correspond to an existing published asset
